store_name_test.comment: This is the ID of the store that was given to you by EMS

shared_secret_test.comment: This is the shared secret provided to you by EMS.

ems_pay_cc.label: EMS Credit card
ems_pay_cc.fields:
Enabled select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 10 1 1 0
Enabled Separate CC select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 10 1 1 0
Title text 20 1 1 1
New Order Status select adminhtml/system_config_source_order_status_processing 30 1 1 0
Data capture mode select ems_pay/source_dataTransferMode 40 1 1 1
ems_pay_general classic
Credit Card Types multiselect ems_pay/source_cctype 45 1 1 0 1
Enable 3D Secure select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 48 1 1 0 If your credit card agreement includes 3D Secure and your Merchant ID has been activated to use this service. >
Allowed Currencies multiselect ems_pay/source_currency 45 1 1 1 1 Currencies allowed for this payment method. If none is selected all from the list are allowed.
Payment from Applicable Countries allowspecific 50 adminhtml/system_config_source_payment_allspecificcountries 1 1 0
Payment from Specific Countries multiselect 60 adminhtml/system_config_source_country 1 1 0 1
Minimum Order Total text 70 1 1 0
Maximum Order Total text 80 1 1 0
Sort Order text 90 1 1 0 validate-number

specific_currency.label: Allowed Currencies
specific_currency.comment: Currencies allowed for this payment method. If none is selected all from the list are allowed.
